title: BIP 71: bCVX to bveCVX transition
body:
TL;DR

Change all Convex Sett emissions to be done in blCVX
Offer fee + gas rebates for users to migrate
$200,000 in CVX for bveCVX/CVX curve pool
Forum Discussion: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-71-bcvx-to-bvecvx-transition/5029
author: 0x9b1673f8d20abbDB67028b38a565E57c67815051
